title: ABN Amro Case Study
description: Case Study: Discover how Jayson Hunter helped ABN Amro bank comply with FSA regulations, by developing new systems to automate a number of manual processes.

caseStudyDetails.projectDescription: ABN AMRO is a Dutch bank that offers a full range of products and services to retail, private, corporate clients. ABN Amro needed to implement new systems to be compliant with FSA regulations.
